original: 《三國演義》杜撰的角色。韓福為曹操屬下，時任洛陽太守，關羽千里走單騎時，因職守阻擾關羽過關，而被關羽斬殺。
text: The role made up in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms". Han Fu was Cao Cao's subordinate, and he was the prefect of Luoyang at that time. When Guan Yu rode solo for thousands of miles, he was beheaded by Guan Yu because of his duties and obstructing Guan Yu's passage.
